import React from "react"; import { Box, makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core"; import { WithTransLate } from "../../translating/index"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { display: "flex", fontFamily: "Josefin Sans", flexDirection: "column", [theme.breakpoints.down("md")]: { flexDirection: "column", }, [theme.breakpoints.down("xs")]: { flexDirection: "column", textAlign: "center", marginLeft: "-50px", }, }, title: { fontFamily: "Oblik", fontSize: "24px", lineHeight: "25px", [theme.breakpoints.down("xs")]: { display: "none", }, }, subtitle: { fontSize: "18px", fontWeight: 400, lineHeight: "25px", letterSpacing: "0em", }, titleContainer: { fontFamily: "Oblik", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", textAling: "left", justifyContent: "space-between", marginTop: "20px", }, textClass: { marginTop: "20px", fontSize: "16px", fontWeight: 300, lineHeight: "25px", letterSpacing: "0em", }, })); function Subtitle({ title, text }) { const { subtitle, textClass, titleContainer } = useStyles(); return (

); } export default function Privacy() { const { root, title } = useStyles(); return (

); }
